docs.text: My Website This is my website . This document is created using Markdown . I created my-website repository on irsbugs account of github In creating i I didn't add any README.md so there were no files in the account. I then went to my laptop where a mkdocs site folder has had git applied. I issued the command: $ git remote add origin https://github.com/irsbugs/my-website.git $ git push -u origin master After this went to my github account and the files and folders from my laptops site folder were in https://github.com/irsbugs/my-website/... In github Settins I set the Github Pages source to be master branch. I was then able to use my laptops browser to go to https://irsbugs.github.io/my-website/index.html and the web-site was available. For some reason https://irsbugs.github.io/my-website/ would give a 404 error but it was OK with the index.html appended to it.
docs.title: Home
